entities.name: pink pages
entities.description: The pink pages were mentioned as flying everywhere when Harry and his fellows jumped up in surprise.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who stepped into Umbridge's office to investigate the commotion.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a person mentioned as having an office at Hogwarts and also in the Ministry, where Harry visited her.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye's eye was mentioned as being used for spying on workers through a telescopic attachment in Umbridge's office.

relationships.description: Harry visited Umbridge's office to investigate the commotion and see what was causing it.
Harry used Mad-Eye's eye, which was attached to a telescopic device in Umbridge's office, to spy on workers.
